title: 尋晚機場鬼佬問:PePe Frog 對反送中運動嘅意義

replies.msg:
美國佬 我

: Why so many PePe Frogs are around here(Lennon Wall), what's the significance
You know, in the US, it means something different.
（佢問點解咁多人貼PePe,響美國PePe 係極右嘅象徵）

:It has nothing to do with the far right ideology in the state. It just looks funny and captures the hearts of so many youngsters. It is a symbol of youth participation in this movement
（我答佢純粹係隻野好笑好得意，某程度係年輕人嘅象徵，象徵住年輕人參與呢場運動）
